review_title: Music Creation for Beginners and Experts
one_reviews_text:
Music creation for the masses! 

Seriously, this is a well-rounded and versatile music creation app. I've been using it since its debut on SideQuest and am overjoyed it's finally available on the official store for everyone (disclaimer here: I won a free key for the release). You can create your own music, do covers of existing music, and just play around and have fun with no specific end goal in mind. 

It's fun no matter which approach you take. 

The devs are very active, use the app themselves, and listen to their community. And the community is open and friendly and glad to help. 

If interested, check out my video on it: https://youtu.be/YAdgzOcIzWo
review_feedback: Thank you so much for the 5 star review, and thank you for being on this journey with us!! <3

review_title: Pro beat creations and very Intuitive
one_reviews_text: Upgraded from the first version and like what they're doing.     Super easy to figure out.    Like the new frames and effects!     I'm a piano player so it's nice to get some different sounds to stretch the imagination.
add lik a guitar or a trumpet
